time-sharing.translation[0].definitions[: a situation in which one computer is used by many different people at different terminals at the same time
the practice of owning a timeshare
time-sharing.translation[1].definitions[: a way for a computer to deal with more than one program at the same time, or for a telephone line to deal with more than one set of signals at the same time
Connections are rapidly switched on a time-sharing basis.
when people buy a holiday home with other people so that they can each spend a period of time there every year
the sale of time-sharing real estate units
